content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage Facility at Position (53.0, -83.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (53.0, -83.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (52.5, -84.5).

### Copper Ore Mining Facility at Position (-23.0, -68.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-23.0, -68.0) connected to Wooden Chests at positions (-23.5, -69.5) and (-24.5, -67.5).

### Iron Ore Mining and Storage Facility at Position (-14.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-14.0, -53.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -54.5).

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (1.5, 0.5) via a Burner Inserter at position (2.5, 0.5).

### Iron Ore Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-19.0, -65.0) with a Burner Inserter at position (-20.5, -66.5) connected to a Transport Belt group at positions (-21.5, -65.5) and (-19.5, -66.5).
- Stone Furnace at position (-21.0, -62.0) with a Burner Inserter at position (-17.5, -64.5) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-16.5, -64.5) via a Transport Belt group at positions (-17.5, -63.5) and (-16.5, -63.5).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting transport belts
- Ensure the path length between transport belts is valid and that the belts are aligned correctly before attempting to connect them.

### Errors when placing entities in occupied positions
- Verify that the target position is clear of any existing objects before placing a new entity to avoid placement errors.
